name: Shell Shock Shipping
description:
Sea Mines have been placed around the tropical paradise of Azure City! Your job is to destroy the bombs, and return the nonfunctioning ones! It's up to you to restore marine accessibility!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse2 - Rotate Camera

Mouse1 - Pick up Mines

LShift - Choo choo

A game by Cecilia Merion and Skye Samarro

Credits:

Boat Model - Creative Tools 3D Benchy
